dwelling.name: Workshop
dwelling.description: Gives gremlins to a visiting hero for free once per week

dwelling.name: Parapet
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit stone gargoyles. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Golem Factory
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit stone, iron, gold and diamond golems. Replenishes every week. Guarded by a pack of gold golems and diamond golems

dwelling.name: Mage Tower
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit mages. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Altar of Wishes
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit genies. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several genies

dwelling.name: Golden Pavilion
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit nagas. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several nagas

dwelling.name: Cloud Temple
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit giants. Replenishes every week. Guarded by a few giants
